Package com.cafean.client.validation

Class DefaultContextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.PrintWriter
        • com.cafean.client.validation.AbstractContextWriter
          • com.cafean.client.validation.DefaultContextWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextWriter, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class DefaultContextWriter
extends AbstractContextWriter
    The default implementation of a ContextWriter that includes ExportContext support and uses a StringBuilder back end for use in a validation display.
    See Also:
    ExportContext, ContextWriter, AbstractContextWriter, ValidationDisplayPanel, AbstractValidationWrapper

      Returns a String containing the text that has been written to this writer.
      int getLength()
      Returns the number of characters that have been written to this context writer.
